message.body: Have you done the mini let lip revision in your Utica Stores yet? If not will u be able to add Herkimer when u do?

Yes I did last week. If you need me to do it let me know I may go get Marilyn for easter. Have a great day. Saw you called I was out with zoey. Is this what you were calling about? Also emailed about store swap ...I want to hang onto Cortland stores.
That's fine I'll do Herkimer for this mini revision but you can have it after that.thanks for letting me know.
Sounds like you're having Easter! Maybe it won't snow on Easter bunny! Have a good one
